Attacks.Name: Flare Blitz
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Dragon Claw
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, this character may immediately make a second Dragon Claw attack against the same target without paying the Power Cost.

Attacks.Name: Heat Wave
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, all characters within Range 2 of the target gain the Incinerate special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Tough Claws
Superpowers.Effect: This character adds 1 die to its attack rolls when targeting an enemy character within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Drought
Superpowers.Effect: For the next round, all Fire-type attacks made by this character gain an additional die.

Attacks.Name: Outrage
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character suffers 1 damage and must target the nearest enemy character with its next attack.

Superpowers.Name: Tough Claws
Superpowers.Effect: This character adds 1 die to its attack rolls when targeting an enemy character within Range 2.
